{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AirTight Networks |model=SS-300-AT |revision=-C-60 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model=WP841AP |manuf_rev=-A6 |availability=EoL (10/31/20201) |fcc_date=11/21/2012 |fcc_id=TOR-SS300AT60 |ic_id=8252A-SS300AT60 |pcb_id=323D180757T7 |type=access point, sensor |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9350 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EMI-12G |fla2=32 |fla2_brand=STMicro |fla2_model=NAND256W3A2BN6 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (Type A) |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J7 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9590 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=RS-232 Driver Receiver;Sipex;SP3220;;1;,,, 1.5A 400V Bridge Rectifier;Diodes Inc.;DF04S;;2;,,, 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;SiGe (Skyworks);SE2595L;;3;,,, 3.9A 200V N-Channel UltraFET MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS2672;;1;,,, 1-Channel Transistor Output Optocoupler;Lite-On;LTV-357T;;1;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier w/Power Detector;Skyworks;SE5005L;;2;,,, 2A 23V Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT7182S;;1;,,, 3A 23V 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT7184S;;2;,,, 802.3af/at PoE Powered Device w/ Integrated DC-DC Controller;Akros Silicon;AS1135;;1; |flags=PoE in, external antennas |stock_boot=U-Boot;0.1.2; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31;LSDK-9.2.0 U10.1020; |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=00:11:74 |oui_eth=00:11:74 }} {{TagLine|AirTight Access Point/Sensor}} :[http://www.airtightnetworks.com/fileadmin/pdf/datasheet/AirTight-SS-300-AT-C-60-Technical-Specification-Sheet.pdf Technical Specification]
Each wireless interface has two U.FL connectors per stream for one internal and external antenna. :Per the FCC manual, the default shell password may be '''config'''.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atheros]]'' AR9350 [[MIPS 74Kc]] (@600MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 4MB NOR Flash, 32MB NAND Flash *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9350 (802.11abgn) : [[Atheros]] AR9590 (802.11abgn) *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1.25A via barrel or 802.3af PoE
==Images== <gallery> File:AirTight Networks SS-300-AT-C-60 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:AirTight Networks SS-300-AT-C-60 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
